author: kfogel
msg: Integrate the EuroOSCON 2005 Version Control BOF notes into the
relevant places in the merge-tracking requirements document and
summit notes.  Remove the VC BOF notes from the list of related
This change creates links from here to specific locations in the VC
BOF notes, so no one ever has to look in both places to find
merge-tracking information again.  If we ever convert the VC BOF
notes to HTML, we can migrate some of the content itself and leave
forwarding pointers, but that's not urgent.
